question: You would like to work for a company or organisation in a foreign country. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter:• Describe the kind of job you would like to do• Explain which country or part of the world you would like to work in• Tell them why you are interested in working in another country
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest in software-related jobs as I  graduated with  a  computer science degree from a reputed academy despite my substantial amount of technical skillset along with a good profound experience.

I strongly believe that there is a huge demand in the North American region for software-related jobs and I am sure that cyberspace coding is a hot skill in the United States of America, hence, I would like to work in the Seattle region which would be easy to get a job. Furthermore, I will have a phenomenal salary in the industry.

As you know the global market demands and compensations, we have a good scope to get the best benefits and offers from the US companies compare to other nations. However, I have a good reference from the US as I did my short-term course at one of the Universities in the Seattle region
I look forward to hearing your response to my letter. I hope it will come soon with good news.
